heading: HB04150
0: AN ACT PROVIDING SUPPORT FOR THE SURVIVING SPOUSE AND LEGAL HEIRS OF SLAIN JUSTICES AND JUDGES, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NUMBER 910, AS AMENDED, ENTITLED "AN ACT TO PROVIDE FOR THE RETIREMENT OF JUSTICES OF THE SUPREME COURT AND OF THE COURT OF APPEALS, FOR THE ENFORCEMENT OF THE PROVISIONS HEREOF BY THE GOVERNMENT SERVICE INSURANCE SYSTEM, AND TO REPEAL COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED FIVE HUNDRED AND THIRTY-SIX," APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES

FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING SUPPORT FOR THE SURVIVING SPOUSE AND LEGAL HEIRS OF SLAIN JUSTICES AND JUDGES, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NUMBER 910, AS AMENDED, ENTITLED "AN ACT TO PROVIDE FOR THE RETIREMENT OF JUSTICES OF THE SUPREME COURT AND OF THE COURT OF APPEALS, FOR THE ENFORCEMENT OF THE PROVISIONS HEREOF BY THE GOVERNMENT SERVICE INSURANCE SYSTEM, AND TO REPEAL COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED FIVE HUNDRED AND THIRTY-SIX," APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
